con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-manualCharging
con:testCase.con:description: Tests different test-case for charge and recharge money for msisdn. Prerequisites: OCS-Mock contains for each valid msisdn balance = 10 â‚¬

con:request.name: 1050P-manualPayment-deduct-Max
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:manualPayment>\r <manualPaymentData>\r <!--type: string-->\r <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN-2}</msisdn>\r <!--type: int-->\r <amount>-${#TestCase#overBalanceAmount}</amount>\r <!--type: string-->\r <balanceType>${#[TestSuite-DEV-ChargeCustomer]#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType>\r <comment>Deduct 11 from balance 10 --> Deduct 10</comment>\r <deductToTheMax>true</deductToTheMax>\r </manualPaymentData>\r </v1:manualPayment>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns2:manualPaymentResponse xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <manualPaymentDataResponse> <msisdn>4917693510043</msisdn> <tenantId>1</tenantId> <brandId>1</brandId> <correlationId>280038056</correlationId> <id>12911884</id> <amount>-110000</amount> <receptionDate>2019-06-28T11:28:00.021+02:00</receptionDate> <committedDate>2019-06-28T11:28:00.073+02:00</committedDate> <paymentDate>2019-06-28T11:28:00.021+02:00</paymentDate> <paymentType>40</paymentType> <paymentTypeDescription>Manuelle Aufladung</paymentTypeDescription> <status>31</status> <statusDescription>ausgefÃ¼hrt und rÃ¼ckgemeldet</statusDescription> <currency>EUR</currency> <balanceType>2</balanceType> <comment>Deduct 11 from balance 10 --> Deduct 10</comment> <deductedAmount>-100000</deductedAmount> <sasCode>SP901</sasCode> </manualPaymentDataResponse> </ns2:manualPaymentResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: 1060N-manualPayment-deductOverBalance
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:manualPayment>\r <manualPaymentData>\r <!--type: string-->\r <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN-2}</msisdn>\r <!--type: int-->\r <amount>-${#TestCase#overBalanceAmount}</amount>\r <!--type: string-->\r <balanceType>${#[TestSuite-DEV-ChargeCustomer]#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType>\r <comment>Deduct 11 from balance 10 must be not possible</comment>\r <deductToTheMax>false</deductToTheMax>\r </manualPaymentData>\r </v1:manualPayment>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Insufficient balance in the balance transfer wallet</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <specificFaultType>THIRD_PARTY_CALL_ERROR_OCS_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>Insufficient balance in the balance transfer wallet</errorMessage> <errorCode>1000000107</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
